text: Motion
Motion

Then, that's it for today's meeting,
sorry for keeping you so late, Chiyoko.

No!
Thank you very much!
I'll walk you out.

Oh, no need for that!
It's okay, the station is right nearby!
...Huh?

Well, I'm sorry for being a bit rushed,
but I'll have to excuse myself shortly after this...!
We need to leave soon, or we'll miss the train---

Chiyoko, today's the day you stay at the dorm, right...?
Because we have an early gathering tomorrow...
Huh?

That's right...!
I'm sorry, I completely forgot...!
Habits can be scary, huh...!
Haha, it happens, it happens.

If you have to make transfers, you can't help but
be sensitive to the time, right? Thanks as always.

That's not necessary at all...!
Really...!

---...Could I ask you to walk me to the dorm again?
I'd like to make the commute easier on days like this.
I'm always making things easier for you, though...!

---...In that case, I'm sorry.
Please, if you don't mind!
